markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />Interact ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You Stride. All creatures within 10 feet of you when you started the Stride must attempt a DC 24 Will save. On a failure, a creature becomes [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) and must spend at least one of its actions on its next turn to move toward you. A fascinated creature can attempt another Will save if you move more than 30 feet away from them, and as normal, acting hostile to a creature or its allies breaks fascination automatically. Creatures that critically failed their save don't receive further saves if you move more than 30 feet away, and acting [hostile](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) to such a creature's allies allows them to attempt another save, rather than automatically ending the fascination. You can Sustain the Activation for up to 1 minute.
